title: Executive Order 8144-Partial Revocation of Executive Order of July 2, 1910, Creating Petroleum Reserve No. 7, Utah No. 1. Petroleum Restoration No. 61
content: UTAH

By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by the act of June 25, 1910, ch. 421, 36 Stat. 847, the Executive Order of July 2, 1910, creating Petroleum Reserve No. 7, Utah No. 1, is hereby revoked as to the following- described lands:
SALT LAKE MERIDIAN
T. 41 S., R. 9 W.,     secs. 25 to 36, inclusive.
T. 42 S., R. 9 W.,     secs. 1 to 18, inclusive.
T. 40 S., R. 10 W.,     sec. 35, all.
T. 41 S., R. 10 W.,     secs. 2 and 3;     secs. 9 to 11, inclusive;     secs. 14 to 16, inclusive;     sec. 17, S½;     secs. 19 to 23, inclusive;     secs. 25 to 36, inclusive.
T. 42 S., R. 10 W.,     secs. 1 to 21, inclusive;     secs. 28 to 33, inclusive.
T. 40 S., R. 11 W.,     secs. 19 to 21, inclusive;     secs. 28 to 33, inclusive.
T. 41 S., R. 11 W.,     secs. 4 to 9, inclusive;     secs. 16 to 36, inclusive.

T. 42 S., R. 11 W.,     secs. 1 to 3, inclusive;     sec. 4, lots 1, 2, 3, 4, 7, 8, 9, 14, and 15, and SE¼NE¼;     sec. 5, lots 1, 2, 3, and 4, S½NW¼, and SW¼;     secs. 6 and 7;     sec. 8, W½W½;     sec. 9, lots 1, 2, and 3, S½NE¼, SE¼NW¼, E½SW¼, and SE¼;     secs. 10 to 18, inclusive.
T. 38 S., R. 12 W.,     secs. 21 and 22;     secs. 27 and 28;     secs. 32 to 34, inclusive.
T. 39 S., R. 12 W.,     secs. 3 to 5, inclusive;     secs. 8 to 10, inclusive;     secs. 15 to 17, inclusive;     secs. 19 to 22, inclusive;     secs. 25 to 36, inclusive.

T. 41 S., R. 12 W.,     secs. 1 to 11, inclusive;     sec. 12, lots 1, 2, 3, and 4, NE¼, and E½SE¼;     sec. 13, lot 1, E½NE¼, and NE¼SE¼;     sec. 14, N½NW¼;     secs. 15 to 18, inclusive;     sec. 20, N½;     secs. 21 and 22;     sec. 23, S½N½and S½;     sec. 24, lots 1 to 8, inclusive, NE¼NW¼, S½NW¼, and SW¼;     secs. 25 to 28, inclusive;     sec. 29, S½;     secs. 31 to 36, inclusive.
T. 39 S., R. 13 W.,     secs. 3 to 10, inclusive;     secs. 15 to 22, inclusive;     secs. 27 to 34, inclusive.
T. 40 S., R. 13 W.,     secs. 3 to 10, inclusive;     secs. 15 to 22, inclusive;     secs. 27 to 33, inclusive.

T. 41 S., R. 13 W.,     secs. 4 to 6, inclusive;     sec. 7, lot 4, N½, N½S½, and SE¼SE¼;     secs. 8 and 9;     secs. 16 and 17;     sec. 18, lots 10 to 14, inclusive, and E½SE¼;     sec. 19, E½NE¼and SE¼;     secs. 20 and 21;     sec. 29, all;     sec. 30, lots 1, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, and 12, and E½;     sec. 31, all.

T. 41 S., R. 14 W.,     sec. 1, all;     secs. 11 and 12;     sec. 13, N½NW¼and SW¼NW¼;     sec. 14, N½, SW¼, N½SE¼, and SW¼SE¼;     sec. 15, all;     secs. 21 and 22;     sec. 23, NW¼NE¼, NW¼, N½SW¼, and SW¼SW¼;     sec. 25, lot 11;     sec. 26, lots 4, 5, 9, 10, and 11;     secs. 27 to 29, inclusive;     secs. 31 to 34, inclusive;     sec. 35, lots 1 to 11, inclusive, S½NE¼, E½NW¼, NE¼SW¼, and N½SE¼;     sec. 36, lots 1, 2, 5, 6, 7, and 8, S½NE¼, E½SW¼, and SE¼.

T. 42 S., R. 14 W.,     secs. 1 and 2;     sec. 3, lots 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 8, 12, 13, and 14;     sec. 4, lots 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 9, and 10, S½N½and N½SW¼;     secs. 5 to 7, inclusive;     sec. 8, lots 1, 2, 3, and 4, S½N½, SW¼, N½SE¼, and SW¼SE¼;     sec. 9, N½NW¼and SW¼NW¼;     sec. 10, lots 1 to 11, inclusive, E½NW¼, W½SW¼, and E½SE¼;     secs. 11 and 12;     secs. 14 and 15;     sec. 16, lots 1 to 8, inclusive, SW¼NE¼, and SE¼SW¼;     sec. 17, N½NW¼and SW¼NW¼;     sec. 18, lots 1 to 12, inclusive, NE¼, N½SE¼, and SW¼SE¼;     sec. 19, lots 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5;     sec. 20, lots 10 and 11, SE¼SE¼;     sec. 21, lots 1 to 13, inclusive, NE¼NW¼, and SE¼;     secs. 22 and 28;     sec. 29, NE¼, SE¼NW¼, and S½;     sec. 31, lots 7, 10, 11, and 12, NE¼NE¼, S½NE¼, and SE¼;     secs. 32 and 33.
T. 42 S., R. 15 W.,     secs. 12 and 13;     sec. 23, all;     sec. 24, N½, SW¼, N½SE¼, and SW¼SE¼;     sec. 25, NW¼;     secs. 26 to 35, inclusive;     sec. 36, SW¼SW¼and SE¼SE¼.

T. 43 S., R. 15 W.,     sec. 1, lots 2, 3, 8, 9, 13, 15, and 16;     secs. 2 to 7, inclusive;     sec. 8, N½, SW¼, and NW¼SE¼;     sec. 9, N½NW¼and SW¼NW¼;     secs. 10 to 15, inclusive;     sec. 16, NE¼NE¼, S½NE¼, NE¼SW¼, S½SW¼, and SE¼;     sec. 18, lots 1 and 2, N½NE¼, and NE¼NW¼;     sec. 20, SE¼NE¼and SE¼;     secs. 21 to 28, inclusive;     sec. 29, NE¼, NE¼NW¼, S½NW¼, and S½;     sec. 30, NE¼SE¼and S½SE¼;     secs. 31 to 36, inclusive.
T. 42 S., R. 16 W.,     sec. 7, all;     secs. 17 to 22, inclusive;     secs. 25 to 36, inclusive.

T. 43 S., R. 16 W.,     secs. 1 to 12, inclusive;     sec. 13, lots 1 to 8, inclusive, NE¼, SE¼NW¼, E½SW¼, and NW¼SE¼;     secs. 14 to 23, inclusive;     sec. 24, W½W½;     sec. 25, W½NW¼, SW¼, and SW¼SE¼;     secs. 26 to 36, inclusive.
T. 41 S., R. 17 W.,     secs. 19 to 21, inclusive;     secs. 27 to 35, inclusive.
T. 42 S., R. 17 W.,     secs. 1 to 17, inclusive;     secs. 20 to 28, inclusive;     secs. 33 to 36, inclusive.
T. 43 S., R. 17 W.,     secs. 1 to 3, inclusive;     secs. 10 to 15, inclusive;     secs. 23 to 25, inclusive.
[NAME]
The White House,May 26, 1939.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 8144-Partial Revocation of Executive Order of July 2, 1910, Creating Petroleum Reserve No. 7, Utah No. 1.
